name: Ruben Marois
title: Talent Acquisition Manager
bio: Ruben is a Talent Acquisition Manager at Hivebrite, based in Paris, France. With 5 years of experience in tech recruitment, first in agencies and now in-house, he is dedicated to helping hiring managers find the right people for their teams. Outside of work, he enjoys spending time with dogs, following Formula 1, and exploring 80s films and music.
